task_description:
# 1.2 Create EquipmentApprovalSubmission model

**Linear Issue:** [BUI-20](https://linear.app/builder-project/issue/BUI-20/12-create-equipmentapprovalsubmission-model)
**Priority:** Medium
**Status:** Backlog


## Description

Create SQLAlchemy model for equipment approval submissions.

**Models:**

**EquipmentApprovalSubmission:**

* id: UUID
* project_id: FK to Project
* template_id: FK to EquipmentTemplate
* name: str (specific equipment name/identifier)
* specifications: JSONB (filled spec values from template)
* documents: JSONB (list of document references with file_ids)
* checklist_responses: JSONB (filled checklist)
* additional_data: JSONB (unlimited extra attributes)
* status: enum (draft, pending_review, approved, rejected)
* submitted_by: FK to User
* submitted_at: datetime
* created_at, updated_at

**EquipmentApprovalDecision:**

* id: UUID
* submission_id: FK to EquipmentApprovalSubmission
* consultant_type_id: FK to ConsultantType
* approver_id: FK to User
* decision: enum (approved, rejected, revision_requested)
* comments: text
* decided_at: datetime

**File:** backend/app/models/equipment_template.py (extend)
